thread.section_title: GoTrusted Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoTrusted | gotrusted.com
thread.title: KGMA

author: KGMA
title: KGMA
text: I live outside the US - and for a long time, GoTrusted got me into all the US sites. But over the past year, the fact that I was using a proxy was detected by every site I wanted to visit. GoTrusted became useless for what I wanted to use it for. The service was always great. The support was always fast and efficient. My only issue is that I cannot access US sites anymore using the GoTrusted service.
